li.label: pony lover
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] finds ponies attractive and interesting. Their magical nature fascinates [PAWN_objective] and [PAWN_pronoun] wouldn't mind getting close to them.

li.label: pony hater
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has a dislike for ponies. {PAWN_pronoun} thinks their obsessive friendliness is suspicious and gives no reason to trust them.

li.label: earth-like lover
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] believes that earth ponies are the ancestors of all pony species and respects them. [PAWN_pronoun] wouldn't mind forming relationships with them to make friends.

li.label: earth-like hater
li.description: Earthpony magic is heresy! [PAWN_nameDef] has a strong drudge toward all ponies without horns or wings. [PAWN_pronoun] considers them an inferior race.

li.label: winged pony lover
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] has always admired the beauty of pegasus flight. [PAWN_pronoun] finds them graceful and [PAWN_pronoun] wouldn't mind getting close to them.

li.label: winged pony hater
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] finds the pegasi history to be terrifying and will never forgive them for the misdeeds of their ancestors. [PAWN_pronoun] finds different ways to fight them.

li.label: horned pony lover
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] is mesmerized by the magical powers of unicorns. [PAWN_pronoun] is eager to get close of them to ask them more about magic.

li.label: horned pony hater
li.description: [PAWN_nameDef] considers unicorns dangerous and shows distrust of their race. [PAWN_pronoun] thinks their magic is no less than a time bomb.
